description: Transaction data. In case of bulk root transaction its data will be signed along with all node transactions by a single bulk transaction signature.

items.description: Transaction schema. This is the hash of the file containing json schema whic can be used to validate and better explain the transaction. Just like this file.
Identifier of the account target of the transaction.
The maximum amount of fuel which signer is willing to spend.
Anti-replay value represented by an array of 8 bytes.
The identifier of the network, to which the transaction will be submitted.
The reference to the smart contract called by the transaction.
The name of the smart contract method called by the transaction.
Public key of the transaction signer.
The algorithm of the signer public key.
The variant of the algorithm of the signer public key.
Arguments which will be passed to the contract method called by the transaction represented by an array of bytes. Probably it's an object serialized using MessagePack format.
